pal 0.0.9082
  • Reference

Get path modification time

Source: R/pal.gen.R
path_mod_time.Rd

Determine a file's or directory's modification time. Other than file.mtime() datetime of modification is always returned in UTC.

path_mod_time(path, follow = FALSE)

Arguments

path

A character vector of one or more paths.
follow

If TRUE, symbolic links will be followed (recursively) and the results will be that of the final file rather than the link.

Value

A datetime.

See also

Other path functions: draw_path_tree(), flatten_path_tree()

Examples

fs::path_package(package = "dplyr",
                 "DESCRIPTION") |>
  pal::path_mod_time()
#> [1] "2022-02-14 04:01:55 UTC"
